DataSourcePortable.Name: Processos por Servidor
DataSourcePortable.Content:
<DataSourceDefinition> <FromSql Alias="A" SelectCommand="SELECT CASE WHEN LOG.SERVIDORPROVIDER IS NOT NULL THEN LOG.SERVIDORPROVIDER ELSE A.HOST END SERVIDOR, 
 COUNT(A.HANDLE) TOTAL, 
 SUM(CASE WHEN LOG.AGENDAMENTO IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AGENDAMENTOS, 
 SUM(CASE WHEN A.IDENTIFICACAOTAREFA IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) BTL, 
 SUM(CASE WHEN A.IDENTIFICACAOTAREFA IS NULL AND LOG.AGENDAMENTO IS NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) OUTROS 
FROM Z_PROCESSOS A 
LEFT JOIN Z_AGENDAMENTOLOG LOG ON LOG.HANDLE = A.AGENDAMENTOLOG 
WHERE (A.HOST IS NOT NULL OR LOG.SERVIDORPROVIDER IS NOT NULL) AND (A.SITUACAO <> 6) AND @CRITERIOSELECAO
GROUP BY CASE WHEN LOG.SERVIDORPROVIDER IS NOT NULL THEN LOG.SERVIDORPROVIDER ELSE A.HOST END
ORDER BY 2" /> <Fields> <Field Alias="SERVIDOR" From="A" Path="SERVIDOR" /> <Field Alias="TOTAL" From="A" Path="TOTAL" /> <Field Alias="AGENDAMENTOS" From="A" Path="AGENDAMENTOS" /> <Field Alias="BTL" From="A" Path="BTL" /> <Field Alias="OUTROS" From="A" Path="OUTROS" /> </Fields> </DataSourceDefinition>
